song_lyrics: Sādhyo aṣhṭāngyog pragaṭ Haritaṇī, prīti māṭe prayatne,
Shodhī vedānt-tattvo, sakaḷ grahī līdhā, jem sindhuthī ratne;
Ādhi vyādhi upādhi praṇatjantaṇī ṭāḷī kīdhī samādhi,
Gopāḷānand Swāmī sakaḷ guṇnidhi, vandu māyā abādhi ||9||
title: Sādhyo aṣhṭāngyog pragaṭ Haritaṇī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-4012: unknown

Category: Vadharana Ashtako
